title: Vanilla cupcakes with buttercream icing
ingredients: ['125g butter or margarine, room temperature', '125g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '125g self-raising flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', 'a few drops of vanilla extract (optional)', 'Buttercream', '150g butter', '300g icing sugar', '1 tablespoon milk', '1 drop food colouring (optional)']
